caption: I came here with my friends and had a great time with very nice warm place and greeted warmly by the staff. Very chic and cozy place to eat. We ordered Num took, Papaya salad,Roti kannai, Bangkok wing, Pad Thai shrimp, and crispy duck basil.We are Thai and we were very impress with the food because the price was reasonable and flavor of the food like authentic Thai. Definitely going back!

What a lovely restaurant! Not to mention about how tasty the food is. I've tried so many thai restaurants in Silver Spring, but the Pepper Thai Kitchen stands out among the crowd! Always enjoying to dine in. I love how inviting this restaurant is. Pad Thai and Chicken Satay are my favorites. Thai iced tea is not too sweet. Reasonable price compared to the portion. Thank you so much the Pepper for retaining your quality in food and service.

I have ordered from them a couple times, and they never let me down. I enjoyed the spicy eggplant and drunken noodles. The flavor was great and I found it mighty tasty. The owner also was very friendly! Overall, it's a great place for thai food!
Oh my goodness I have been looking for really good quality Thai food that delivers and I’ve finally found it. I’m gonna be ordering many many times. And it arrived so quickly!!
Nice Staff. I like the steam dumplings and satay. Hope to go back and try something else soon
I had their pad Thai and it was good.

Chris, the owner, contacted me about my recent experience at his restaurant and has offered to make our experience right. He will be preparing a new meal for me and my family. I really appreciate his concern about pleasing a new customer. I will update my experience with The Pepper Thai Kitchen. It is my hope that we can make this our new "go to" for Thai food in Silver Spring MD.

I have been here for several times since they renovated. The food is always great as well as the service. I oftentimes order shrimp fried rice, but this time I just wanted to check out the different dishes. I had Nam Tok and Pad Woonsen with jasmine rice and they were tasty. Price was reasonable, too.

I ordered carryout tonight and it was delivered quickly. The food tasted great and I was pleasantly surprised at the flavor of the pad thai. I think I'll order it again tomorrow!! I recommend giving this place a try!
It is much better now! Come see it!! We will miss you all!

This place was mmm mmm good. The best Thai food that I've ever had! I had the green curry and the curry puffs!! Try the curry puffs yourself. The staff was also very nice, and the dining room was comfortable and much different then the previous ownership which was old and run down.

I ordered pad thai and tom kha soup for takeout yesterday, and I was very happy with the flavor and price! I will recommend this place to anyone who enjoys Thai food, and when I stopped in to pick it up, I really noticed how great the new interior looked. I will dine in next time.

It's the old Thai Derm, after that Ruang Khao - pretty much the same kitchen and menu. Good  rice based dishes except beef, nice fish. I would skip duck (but YMMV) and shrimp is for the debate - I would go instead with fish, especially full one. Soups are the best.
My wife and I love this place.  We come here so many times and always love the food and the services .

My boyfriend and I enjoyed our dinner here last night.  I loved their food. It was flavorful, and the presentation was lovely. I loved how the dining room looked. Felt so cozy. This is my recent favorite thai restaurant in the area!

Certainly, The pepper cant get anything below 5 stars. I and my niece went there for a quick lunch. Their lunch special is the best in town. Drunken noodle is very rich on flavor, atmosphere is very cozy. Bottom line is no one can beat their $8.95 lunch special in Silver Spring!

People there were so friendly. They were so helpful trying to recommend some of their signature dishes to us. I ordered the pineapple fried rice and my husband had their crispy duck. Everything was satisfied and we will go back again next time.

I came back for the second time since this restaurant has been renovated. The dining area is lovely! I really enjoyed the ambiance, and the food and service were great. I highly recommend this place if you are craving for some delicious thai food.

I went to the Pepper today for lunch, and was very surprised at how clean and nice looking it was inside. The place has a totally different feel then before, and the food was great! I will absolutely go back, and you really should check out how it looks inside!
